emissions.closest_match_explanation: Matched '250 g fresh pasta' to 'Pasta, raw' as it is the least processed form of pasta available in the database.
Matched '1 onion' to 'Onion, raw' as it is the most direct and least processed option available.
Matched '1 bunch of green asparagus' to 'Asparagus, green, raw' as it is the most direct match for fresh asparagus.
Matched '1 squash' to 'Squash, raw' as it is the most direct and least processed option available.
Matched '1 handful of fresh basil' to 'Basil, fresh' as it is the most direct match for fresh basil.
Matched '2 dl cream' to 'Cream, whipping, 38 % fat' as it is the closest match for cream with a specific fat content.
Matched '1 dl water' to 'Water, tap, drinking, average values' as it is the most common and direct match for water.
Matched '6 tbsp grated parmesan' to 'Cheese, hard, Parmesan, 32 % fidm.' as it is the most direct match for grated parmesan cheese.
Matched '1 handful of mozzarella' to 'Cheese, semihard, Mozzarella, 30 % fidm.' as it is the most direct match for mozzarella cheese.
Matched 'salt' to 'Salt, table' as it is the most direct and least processed option available.
Matched 'pepper' to 'Pepper, black' as it is the most common and direct match for pepper.
Matched 'oil' to 'Olive oil' as it is a common type of oil with a specific emission factor.
